text: Carlos Eccehomo Cuesta Figueroa (9 March 1999) is a Colombian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Belgian First Division A side Genk. ==Career== ===KRC Genk=== On 5 July 2019 Belgian club K.R.C. Genk announced, that they had signed Cuesta on a contract until June 2024.Carlos Cuesta joins Genk!, krcgenk.be, 5 July 2019 ==References== ==External links== *Carlos Cuesta at Genk's website Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Quibdó Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Atlético Nacional footballers Category:K.R.C. Genk players Category:Colombia under-20 international footballers Category:Colombia youth international footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Belgium Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Belgium
title: Carlos Cuesta
